title: Manage Emergency Response Drill
description: An HSE superintendent runs a simulated emergency drill (e.g., a fire in the processing plant) to test the site's emergency response team.

tasks.description: Initiate the drill by triggering a simulated fire alarm in the control room.
tasks.expected_outcome: The drill is started, and the site's emergency alarm is sounded.

tasks.description: Observe and time the response of the emergency team, including their muster time and how they approach the simulated fire.
tasks.expected_outcome: The response is observed and key performance indicators (like response time) are recorded.

tasks.description: Conduct a debrief after the drill to discuss what went well and identify areas for improvement. Log these in a tracking system.
tasks.expected_outcome: A list of improvement actions is created and logged for tracking to completion.
